project.name: installer-wrapper
project.description: This buildfile is used to make the izpack task know about the properties defined in build.xml and should never be used on its own.

target.name: step
target.description: Creates an installer in order to deploy our final product to the consumer.

izpack.config:
<installation version="1.0"> <info> <appname>scetris</appname> <appsubpath>scetris</appsubpath> <appversion>prealpha</appversion> <authors> <author name="David Bialik" email="david.bialik@fu-berlin.de" /> <author name="Julian Fleischer" email="julian.fleischer@fu-berlin.de" /> <author name="Hagen Mahnke" email="hagen.mahnke@fu-berlin.de" /> <author name="Konrad Reiche" email="konrad.reiche@fu-berlin.de" /> <author name="André Zoufahl" email="andre.zoufahl@fu-berlin.de" /> </authors> </info>
<guiprefs width="525" height="425" resizable="yes" />
<locale> <langpack iso3="eng" /> <langpack iso3="deu" /> </locale>
<variables> <variable name="tomcat.zip.path" value="@{scetris.setup.tomcat.zip}" /> <variable name="scetris.dir" value="@{scetris.build.deploy}" /> <variable name="tomcat.context" value="@{scetris.setup.tomcat.context}" /> <variable name="user.tomcat" value="" />
<variable name="setup.db.database" value="" /> <variable name="setup.db.password" value="" /> <variable name="setup.db.username" value="" /> <variable name="webapp.db.database" value="" /> <variable name="webapp.db.hostname" value="" /> <variable name="webapp.db.password" value="" /> <variable name="webapp.db.port" value="" /> <variable name="webapp.db.username" value="" /> </variables>
<dynamicvariables> <variable name="user.tomcat" value="${INSTALL_PATH}${FILE_SEPARATOR}tomcat" condition="installTomcat" /> <variable name="classpath" value="${user.tomcat}${FILE_SEPARATOR}webapps${FILE_SEPARATOR}${tomcat.context}${FILE_SEPARATOR}WEB-INF${FILE_SEPARATOR}classes${SYSTEM_path_separator}${user.tomcat}${FILE_SEPARATOR}webapps${FILE_SEPARATOR}${tomcat.context}${FILE_SEPARATOR}WEB-INF${FILE_SEPARATOR}lib${FILE_SEPARATOR}weave.jar${SYSTEM_path_separator}${user.tomcat}${FILE_SEPARATOR}webapps${FILE_SEPARATOR}${tomcat.context}${FILE_SEPARATOR}WEB-INF${FILE_SEPARATOR}lib${FILE_SEPARATOR}postgresql-8.4-702.jdbc4.jar${SYSTEM_path_separator}${user.tomcat}${FILE_SEPARATOR}webapps${FILE_SEPARATOR}${tomcat.context}${FILE_SEPARATOR}WEB-INF${FILE_SEPARATOR}lib${FILE_SEPARATOR}log4j-1.2.16.jar${SYSTEM_path_separator}${user.tomcat}${FILE_SEPARATOR}webapps${FILE_SEPARATOR}${tomcat.context}${FILE_SEPARATOR}WEB-INF${FILE_SEPARATOR}lib${FILE_SEPARATOR}junction.jar" /> </dynamicvariables>
<resources> <res id="Installer.image" src="installer/scetris_install.png" /> <res id="LicencePanel.licence" src="LICENSE" /> <res id="InfoPanel.info" src="ABOUT" /> <res id="userInputSpec.xml" src="installer/userInputSpec.xml" /> <res id="userInputLang.xml_eng" src="installer/userInputLang.xml_eng" /> <res id="userInputLang.xml_deu" src="installer/userInputLang.xml_deu" /> </resources>
<conditions> <condition id="installTomcat" type="PackSelection"> <packid>tomcatID</packid> </condition> </conditions>
<panels> <panel classname="HelloPanel" /> <panel classname="InfoPanel" /> <panel classname="LicencePanel" /> <panel classname="PacksPanel" /> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" condition="!installTomcat" /> <panel classname="TargetPanel" /> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" /> <panel classname="SummaryPanel" /> <panel classname="InstallPanel" /> <panel classname="FinishPanel" /> </panels>
<packs> <pack id="tomcatID" name="tomcat" required="no" preselected="yes"> <description>copy tomcat to user defined path</description> <file src="${tomcat.zip.path}" targetdir="${INSTALL_PATH}/tomcat" override="askfalse" unpack="true" /> </pack> <pack name="scetris" required="yes" preselected="yes"> <description>copy scetris into tomcat/webapps/ROOT/</description> <fileset dir="@{scetris.build.deploy}" targetdir="${user.tomcat}/webapps/${tomcat.context}" override="askfalse" /> <parsable targetfile="${user.tomcat}/webapps/${tomcat.context}/WEB-INF/scetris.properties" /> <executable targetfile="java" stage="postinstall" keep="true"> <args> <arg value="-cp" /> <arg value="${classpath}" /> <arg value="de.fu.scetris.Installer" /> <arg value="--superuser" /> <arg value="${setup.db.username}" /> <arg value="--admin-db" /> <arg value="${setup.db.database}" /> <arg value="--master-pw" /> <arg value="${setup.db.password}" /> <arg value="--hostname" /> <arg value="${webapp.db.hostname}" /> <arg value="--port" /> <arg value="${webapp.db.port}" /> <arg value="--database" /> <arg value="${webapp.db.database}" /> <arg value="--username" /> <arg value="${webapp.db.username}" /> <arg value="--password" /> <arg value="${webapp.db.password}" /> </args> </executable> </pack> </packs> </installation>
